name: Honk
desc: HONK World represents the clown world we are all living in today. HONK token is one of the oldest tokens on BCH. Now migrated from SLP to SmartBCH, its scope has expanded to HONK World, which includes farming and NFTs. HONK World and its HONK token aim to bring more fun into crypto and the SmartBCH ecosystem!

name: DÃ¶ner
desc: DONER is the official fan, art and experimental research and development token for DÃ¶ner Tallrik collective. DONER has no intrinsic value.

name: Green Ben
desc: Green Ben (EBEN) is the native and governance token of BenSwap (SmartBCH). BenSwap (SmartBCH) starts as clone of BenSwap on Binance Smart Chain and aims to become one of the leading DEXs on SmartBCH.

name: CashCats
desc: CashCats aims to be an extension of the BCH peer-to-peer electronic cash movement & a mascot for the BCH community. We love $CATS! Our goal is to show as much love & respect as possible to everyone around the world and spread $CATS and introduce SmartBCH to as many people as possible!

name: Knuth
desc: High-performance Bitcoin Cash node and development platform.

name: The Wireless Token
desc: WRS is the reward token of HAM.

name: Bitcoin Cash Argentina
desc: We are a group of people who have found in Bitcoin Cash (BCH) the solution to many of the problems of money as we know it, and that is why we are dedicated to promoting its adoption in Argentina as a currency for daily use.

name: UatX Token
desc: UatX Project is a non-profit organization used to maintain BCH nodes and smartbch rpc server nodes. At present, we are running China optimized sbch nodes and servers, and we will add more servers for global use in the near future. All income will be funded for project development, such as adding new networks and servers. Currently running rpc.uatvo.com and multi coin node.

name: MAZE
desc: MAZE is mineable (proof-of-work) smartBCH virtual asset. It is decentralized (operates without a central issuer and without a centralized promotion or sales developement). No premine and no presale. Max total supply: 21m. Due to decentralization and permissionless character, there is no specific market target. However digital visual arts are most welcome.

name: CashKitten
desc: $kitten is a SEP20 token in smartBCH. It devotes itself to become the cutest meme token loved by BCHer. Most of the tokens have been deployed for free to their fans. Kitten represents BCHer's curiosity and exploration towards world. $kitten will grow up with their owners.

name: flexUSD
desc: flexUSD is a multi-yield bearing stablecoin and is the most popular stablecoin on SLP.

name: CandyMan
desc: CandyMan is a project that is running from 11/11/2020, this token was firstly minted on simpleledger protocol, main goal of candyman is to spread sweetness and kindness, we are growing and we are progressing towards the sweetest tokens!

name: MGOT
desc: Mode of Transfer Alternative (MoTA) is an Assistive Technology for Blockchain transactions and transfers between non-technicals. MoTA brings blockchain transactions to remote and technologically handicapped individuals and communities through a decentralized censorship-resistant network of enablers. The MoTA Hub is the platform being developed to facilitate blockchain use by societies where not everyone has a phone or access to the internet and where most of the people are not technologically literate. MoTA Global Operational Token (MGOT) drives this project with many incentives for holders helping grow blockchain adoption.

name: MrUSD
desc: The MoTA Remit Universal Stable Digital (MrUSD) token is a project utility token. This is a token that allows MTs and IUs on the MH to transfer BA across the MH. In other words, it is a transfer vehicle on the MH. MTs can hold MrUSD. IUs can also hold MrUSD as well. MrUSD is transformed at any MTs for FM. IUs may also interact directly between themselves with MrUSD.

name: FLEX Coin
desc: FLEX Coin powers the CoinFLEX exchange and is the foundation of the CoinFLEX ecosystem. Across all of our products, FLEX Coin provides all our users with exclusive benefits that makes trading on CoinFLEX that much better.

name: Potato
desc: Potato Coin (POTA) is a cryptocurrency on SmartBCH with extremely low fees and extremely high memes.

name: MistToken
desc: Mist is a smartBCH exchange, and a suite of tools to help empower the individual. Our main product is MistSwap, the exchange, which is based on the popular SushiSwap exchange.

name: Cheese
desc: Cheese token is a coin with 10 billion supply. We plan to airdrop additional tokens to Cheese hodlers in the future.

name: ShibaCash
desc: We plan to entice new people across to sBCH with a project that they will be comfortable with, brings value and will provide NFT collections, Competitions with Prizes. We aim to give information and knowledge on sBCH as a whole and spread the word.

name: MILK
desc: MuesliSwap is a new decentralized exchange (DEX) operating on the Smart Bitcoin Cash blockchain. In addition, a second DEX on the Cardano blockchain is currently being developed. More details will be released soon.

name: BCHPad
desc: BCHPad is DeFi Launchpad for Smart BitcoinCash.

name: Celery
desc: The first blockchain annuity that will replace your salary.

name: Decentralized Autonomous Organization
desc: DAO is a decentralized token issued by the community spontaneously based on SmartBCH, with a total supply of 210 billion, all to be airdropped, and the holding address is publicly available. It has been launched on SmartBCH DEX BenSwap.

name: FATCAT
desc: Those who love cats, will love $FATCAT. The goal of $FATCAT is, to bring as many people to smartBCH as possible. And that should happen sweet and fluffy. In addition to an NFT and a NFT marketplace, other things will be created for and with $FATCAT in order, to make $FATCAT usable and stable in the future.

name: CATSLUCK
desc: We are supporters of cashcats. People often ask what can we do with $CATS? So catsluck was born. You can bet and invest with $CATS now, and do more things in the future.

desc: Konra is a merit system, peer to peer crypto currency and tipping token. Itâ€™s ultimate purpose is to improve peopleâ€™s lives.

name: Volcano
desc: Set slippage to 12% to trade!!! BURN is a community based deflationary token derived from SafeMoon. 10% tax occured during each transfer or trade. 5% is reflected to all holders for passive income. 5% is added to a liquidity pool. A burn wallet receives a portion of the reflections to never be seen again. Total supply: 1 quadrillion. Maximum amount in each transaction: 5 trillion. Initial liquidity is locked for 3 years. Let us HODL to the moon!

name: MoonMoonMoonMoon
desc: There are only 1000. Minting Baton is destroyed.

name: FireDAO
desc: FireDAO will constantly burn, charging a 5% fee for each transfer, of which 3% goes to token holders and 2% is added to the liquidity pool. 40% of the Total Supply has been sent to the black hole address, and the black hole address will also participate in the share.  The remaining 60% has been added benswap and have locked LP in Benswap.  The biggest liquidity is in DAO-FireDAO LP, and buying with DAO has more advantages.
